com.wolvencraft.yasp

Enum CommandManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<CommandManager>
      • com.wolvencraft.yasp.CommandManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<CommandManager>

    public enum CommandManager
extends java.lang.Enum<CommandManager>
    A sturdy implementation of a CommandManager focused on handling sub-commands.
    Additionally, stores the CommandSender for the duration of the command execution.
    Author:
    bitWolfy

        Performs permissions checks and runs the command.

      • getSender

        public static CommandSender getSender()
        Returns the CommandSender for the current command.
        Unsafe; should only be used inside command classes.
        Returns:
        CommandSender

      • setSender

        public static void setSender(CommandSender sender)
        Sets the CommandSender to the one specified.
        Parameters:
        sender - CommandSender to be set as the current one

      • resetSender

        public static void resetSender()
        Resets the CommandSender to null to prevent memory leaks.
        This method is to be run at the end of onCommand()
